algorithm_technique: Iterative merging and addition of linked list nodes based on power
problem_summary_simple: Add two polynomials represented as linked lists, combining terms with the same power.
problem_summary_technical: Iterates through two sorted linked lists, merging nodes by power and summing coefficients, creating a new linked list.
key_insights: The input polynomials are sorted by power, enabling a merge-like approach.
Handle cases where powers match, one list is longer, or the sum of coefficients is zero.
A dummy head node simplifies the construction of the result linked list.
